Uses Safemath to prevent overflow checking","kind":"dev","methods":{"assignAuditors(uint256)":{"details":"calls the AuditEnrollments and AuditAssignments smart contract associated to DAudit Random numbers won't be succeptible to any fraud if manipulated so we keep it simple and based on the block.timestamp","params":{"auditId":"TokenId of the Audit Item which auditors wants to be assigned "}},"calculateProducerFee(uint256)":{"params":{"_auditFee":"fee charged for listing an audit item"}},"constructor":{"details":"Make use of Enrollments and Assignments smart contracts which are initialized in the constructor (at deployment time)  which may be improved by implementing a registry of smart contracts in future versions. audit","nftContract":"Nft Contract Address of the Audit Item","tokenId":"Nft TokenId of the Audit Item"}},"createAuditResult(address,uint256,uint256,uint8)":{"params":{"auditItemId":"TokenId of the AuditItem","auditResult":"AuditResult.Passed or AuditResult.Failed","nftContract":"Address of the AuditItem NFT contract","tokenIdResult":"TokenId of the AuditResult"}},"enrollAuditor(uint256,address)":{"details":"calls the AuditEnrollments smart contract associated to DAudit","params":{"auditId":"TokenId of the Audit Item which auditor wants to be enrolled","auditor":"address of the auditor who wants to be enrolled"}},"fetchAuditByTokenId(uint256)":{"returns":{"_0":"AuditItemData structure with audit item information "}},"fetchAudits()":{"returns":{"_0":"Array of AuditItemData"}},"fetchItemsProducer()":{"details":"the producer parameter is obtained from the message sender","returns":{"_0":"Array of AuditItemData"}},"fetchPendingAudits()":{"returns":{"_0":"Array of AuditItemData"}},"getAuditorsRequiredForAudit(uint256)":{"returns":{"auditorReq":"number of auditors required to complete the audit "}},"getListingFee()":{"returns":{"_0":"listing fee storage variable with the configuration of the listing fee "}},"payAuditors(uint256)":{"params":{"auditId":"token Id of the audit item "}},"setListingFee(uint256)":{"details":"updates the listing fee storage variable with the configuration of the listing fee ","params":{"_listingFee":"fee charged for listing an audit item"}}},"title":"Decentralized Audit Main Smart Contract with business logic","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"assignAuditors(uint256)":{"notice":"Assigns the auditors required for the audit processes from the enrolled ones"},"calculateProducerFee(uint256)":{"notice":"Returns the fee charged to the producers including listing fee + fees paid to auditors"},"constructor":{"notice":"DAudit constructor called at deploy time, need to be called with the enrollments and assignments  smart contracts addresses"},"createAuditItem(address,uint256,uint256,uint8)":{"notice":"Creates an auditItem and sets it available on the descentralized audit system"},"createAuditResult(address,uint256,uint256,uint8)":{"notice":"Creates an Audit Result and sets it available on the distributed audit system  Anly assigned auditors can submit audit results"},"enrollAuditor(uint256,address)":{"notice":"Adds an auditor to the list of auditors enrolled for performing the audit"},"fetchAuditByTokenId(uint256)":{"notice":"Returns Audit Item by TokenId"},"fetchAudits()":{"notice":"Returns all audits submitted to DAudit system"},"fetchItemsProducer()":{"notice":"Returns all audits submitted to DAudit system for a given producer (msg.sender)"},"fetchMyAudits()":{"notice":"Returns only items that are associated to the producer "},"fetchPendingAudits()":{"notice":"Returns audits with status = Pending"},"getAuditorsRequiredForAudit(uint256)":{"notice":"Returns the numbers of auditors required for an AuditItem   "},"getListingFee()":{"notice":"Query the listing fee currently set up for the contract"},"payAuditors(uint256)":{"notice":"Function triggered from the DAudit Smart Contract to pay the auditors  Transfers ownership of the item, as well as funds between auditors who participated in the audit "},"setListingFee(uint256)":{"notice":"Query the listing fee currently set up for the contract"}},"notice":"DAudit is the smart contract containing the business logic for handling the audit devdoc.author: Enrique R. D'Angelo
devdoc.details: Extends ReentrancyGuard for preventing a contract from calling itself, directly or indirectly.  Uses nonReentrant modifier on any functions that calls another smart contract. Uses Safemath to prevent overflow checking

assignAuditors(uint256).details: calls the AuditEnrollments and AuditAssignments smart contract associated to DAudit Random numbers won't be succeptible to any fraud if manipulated so we keep it simple and based on the block.timestamp

params.auditId: TokenId of the Audit Item which auditors wants to be assigned

params._auditFee: fee charged for listing an audit item

constructor.details: Make use of Enrollments and Assignments smart contracts which are initialized in the constructor (at deployment time)  which may be improved by implementing a registry of smart contracts in future versions.

params._auditAssignmentsAddr: address of the AuditAssignments smart contract
params._auditEnrollmentsAddr: address of the AuditEnrollments smart contract

params.auditFee: Fee payed by the producer to the auditors
params.auditorsReq: Number of auditors required to complete the audit
params.nftContract: Nft Contract Address of the Audit Item
params.tokenId: Nft TokenId of the Audit Item

params.nftContract: Address of the AuditItem NFT contract

enrollAuditor(uint256,address).details: calls the AuditEnrollments smart contract associated to DAudit

params.auditId: TokenId of the Audit Item which auditor wants to be enrolled
params.auditor: address of the auditor who wants to be enrolled

returns._0: AuditItemData structure with audit item information

fetchItemsProducer().details: the producer parameter is obtained from the message sender

returns.auditorReq: number of auditors required to complete the audit

returns._0: listing fee storage variable with the configuration of the listing fee

params.auditId: token Id of the audit item

setListingFee(uint256).details: updates the listing fee storage variable with the configuration of the listing fee

params._listingFee: fee charged for listing an audit item

devdoc.title: Decentralized Audit Main Smart Contract with business logic

assignAuditors(uint256).notice: Assigns the auditors required for the audit processes from the enrolled ones

calculateProducerFee(uint256).notice: Returns the fee charged to the producers including listing fee + fees paid to auditors

constructor.notice: DAudit constructor called at deploy time, need to be called with the enrollments and assignments  smart contracts addresses

createAuditItem(address,uint256,uint256,.notice: Creates an auditItem and sets it available on the descentralized audit system

createAuditResult(address,uint256,uint25.notice: Creates an Audit Result and sets it available on the distributed audit system  Anly assigned auditors can submit audit results

enrollAuditor(uint256,address).notice: Adds an auditor to the list of auditors enrolled for performing the audit

fetchAudits().notice: Returns all audits submitted to DAudit system

fetchItemsProducer().notice: Returns all audits submitted to DAudit system for a given producer (msg.sender)

fetchMyAudits().notice: Returns only items that are associated to the producer

getAuditorsRequiredForAudit(uint256).notice: Returns the numbers of auditors required for an AuditItem

getListingFee().notice: Query the listing fee currently set up for the contract

payAuditors(uint256).notice: Function triggered from the DAudit Smart Contract to pay the auditors  Transfers ownership of the item, as well as funds between auditors who participated in the audit

setListingFee(uint256).notice: Query the listing fee currently set up for the contract

userdoc.notice: DAudit is the smart contract containing the business logic for handling the audit processes.
